thread.title: Weekend stay w family
thread.title_full: Weekend stay w family - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bigsur221
title: Weekend stay w family
text: We recently completed a stay at the Lexington- 3 of us in total. This was our third stay here over the years. Overall it was similar to past visits- the room (king) had two bathrooms which was nice and was relatively spacious by NY standards. The furnishings haven't changed much over the year- somewhat sparse but the bed it comfortable and there was a chair with ottoman. Overall- the room was fine although we could hear both the large fans running (in the back) most of the night and the neighbors one night- could use some soundproofing. That said, given the location and the price- it was reasonable. Breakfast (continental) was included. Never saw in room dining so likely it isn't available- which is something to consider when staying here.
